Gotify.description:
A simple server for sending and receiving messages.

Based on the official OCI image, available for amd64 architecture only.

/app/data.description: Share for the database, plugins and images for applications.
/app/data.label: Database and App Images [e.g. gotify]

Gotify.more_info: Default username is admin and password is admin. For usage instructions visit the gotify Getting Started guide
